title: House, Short Term, Furnished, FUN area, Patio, Walk Everything
posting_body: ['PLEASE NOTE: this is a short term, furnished rental, available by the week, or month.', ' It is only available until Nov. 1st.', '* Pricing depends on: headcount, how long, pets  (I am currently using AirBnb, but I have come to hate their fees, horrendous customer service, and onerous rules, so I am considering week to week or month to month on my own)', '* Not for single bedrooms, this is the entire house only', '** Bookings by Venmo, cashiers check or cash, in advance, with damage deposit, lease/contract, no credit card or pay-as-you-go ...', 'The good stuff:', "* Best location in Englewood, walk to: Light Rail, Grocery, Dispensary, Liquor Stores, Brewery and Bowling, Wal-Mart, Coffee Houses, Every kind of ethnic and American food, Sports Bars, 20+ restaurants: McD, B.King, Taco Bell etc.; Noodles and Company, Chipotle, Pho; Thai, Vietnamese, Middle East, Mexican, Italian, Sushi, Falafel, high-end Steakhouse, Italian Bistro; many of the above with lively patio or rooftop dining, lots of nightlife, live music, bowling and pool, small music venues, and best: The Gothic Theater - Denver's best indoor music venue - is only four blocks walk.", '* Red Rocks and foothills hiking trails, 20 min.', 'drive, Downtown under 15 min.', 'drive (in good traffic, of course!)', '* New appliances and kitchen', '* New windows, great breezes, AC (evaporative cooler), and all the sunlight you want in all the rooms.', '* 5 ft x 5 ft picture window with mountain views', '*', 'Large patio with shade, full patio-set, huge gas grill / smoker', '* Laundry in basement', '* Two BRs upstairs, one large BR downstairs', '* One full bath upstairs, half bath downstairs', '* Plenty off Street Parking', 'For a $ Quote, please reply with:', '** How many people?', 'Pets?', '** Ideal check-in / out dates', '**', 'Your contact info']
